#summary Maven dependency details.

= Introduction =

The Mutability Detector is now available with maven (and compatible build tools) from the Sonatype OSS snapshot repository.


= Details =

For now, until a full release goes to Maven Central, the Sonatype repository must be made available to your maven build. This can be done by adding the following snippet to your pom.xml:

{{{
<repositories>
  <repository>
    <id>Sonatype Snapshots</id>  
    <url>http://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots</url>
  </repository>
</repositories>
}}}

The dependency snippet for Mutability Detector is:

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.mutabilitydetector</groupId>
  <artifactId>MutabilityDetector</artifactId>
  <version>[0.6, )</version>
  <scope>test</scope>
</dependency>
}}}

For users of other dependency/build tools, the relevant information is:

|| Group ID	|| Artifact ID	|| Version ||
|| org.mutabilitydetector	|| MutabilityDetector	|| 0.6-SNAPSHOT ||
